review_text: I have never been so impressed with the customer service of a hotel. Every single staff member went above-and-beyond to make us feel like we were the most important guests in the hotel. I have traveled all over the world, and have never been more impressed with the level of hospitality provided at the St. Regis in NYC.Dear Julie D, A complimentary review such as yours is always welcomed. Thank you for taking the time to post your comments on TripAdvisor. I sincerely look forward to welcoming you back to The St. Regis Hotel New York in the not-so-distant future.Sincerely, Octavia MargineanHotel Manager
